doc:
Michel Robin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michel_Robin 0 Michel Robin (born 13 October 1930) is a French film actor and comedian. He has appeared in 120 films since 1966. He has worked with directors including William Klein, Costa-Gavras, Marcel Camus, Gérard Oury, Andrzej Żuławski, Jean L'Hôte, Francis Veber, José Giovanni, Claude Chabrol, Alexandre Astruc, Jim Henson, Jaco Van Dormael, Édouard Molinaro, Pascal Thomas, Jean-Paul Salomé, Jean-Pierre Mocky, Jean-Pierre Jeunet, Sylvain Chomet, Benoît Jacquot, Alain Resnais and Arnaud Desplechin. Michel_Robin ( born 13_October_1930 ) is a_French_film_actor_and_comedian . He has_appeared in 120_films since 1966 .
